item.title: Adding services. Sorting the "forms" category.
item.description:
https://qualtrics.com/free-account - — Create professional forms & survey using this first class tool. 50+ expert-designed survey templates. Free Account has limit of 1 active survey, 100 responses/survey & 8 response types.
https://stepform.io - Quiz and Form Builder. Free plan has 5 forms, up to 3 steps per form, 50 responses per month.
https://webask.io - Survey and Form Builder. Free plan has 3 surveys per account, 100 responses per month, 10 elements per survey.
https://www.wufoo.com/ - Quick forms to use on websites. Free plan has a limit of 100 submissions each month.

item.title: Add Warrant to Security and PKI
item.description: https://warrant.dev/ - Hosted enterprise-grade authorization and access control service for your apps. Free tier includes 5,000 API requests per month.

item.title: Add `checklyhq.com` to Testing
item.description: https://checklyhq.com - Checkly is the API & E2E monitoring platform for the modern stack: programmable, flexible and loving JavaScript. Generous free tier for devs.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://osdn.net/ - OSDN.net is a free-of-charge service for open source software developers, offering SVN/Git/Mercurial/Bazaar/CVS repositories and more.

item.title: Add mailmenot.io temp email service
item.description: http://mailmenot.io - Free disposable temporary email service with ability to add multiple email addresses

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://cronhooks.io/ - Replace your cron jobs with webhooks. Invoke any webhook at a given date time or repeatedly using cron expressions. Free plan allows 1 webhook schedule.

item.title: Add public-apis github repo to Apis section
item.description: https://github.com/public-apis/public-apis - Repo](https://github.com/public-apis/public-apis) — A list of free public APIs.

item.title: Linked STUN to wikipedia definition.
item.description: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/STUN) — Session Traversal of User Datagram Protocol [UDP] Through Network Address Translators [NATs] - Session Traversal of User Datagram Protocol [UDP] Through Network Address Translators [NATs])

item.title: Sort alphabetically Tunneling section, fix em-dash
item.description:
https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel - Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).
https://www.radmin-vpn.com/) — Connect multiple computers together via a VPN enabling LAN-like networks. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative - — Connect multiple computers together via a VPN enabling LAN-like networks. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative)
stun:stun.l.google.com:19302 - — [stun:stun.l.google.com:19302](stun:stun.l.google.com:19302)
stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp - — [stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp](stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp)
https://tailscale.com/ - Zero config VPN, using the open source WireGuard protocol. Installs on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android devices. Free plan for personal use with 20 devices.

item.title: Edit descriptions of Localhost.run, localtunnel
item.description:
https://localhost.run/ - Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel - Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).
